title: capsules and stuff about honor and stuff
body: well i just got a question about the capsules and stuff u seee i've had over honor 3 for a while was the first to get it in what ive seen and got honor 5 but no capsule yet i thought the rate of getting capsules grew higher as honor grew higher but i guess not im just wondering in average and stuff how many capsules should i have and stuff liek at what rate do i get one as in randoly 1 every month in average or something like that? im just wondering sorry cause every i kind of know has gotten capsules if they arent trolls so

replies.body: Honor capsules are still limited to the 12 key fragments earned per ~28 days.  You'll have a chance for your key fragment drop to be substituted as a capsule instead.  Your level of honor won't impact that rate.  Let me know if that clears things up!
